JobTitle: Territory Analyst - Fraud, Money & Support, Uber Eats
JobFullDesc: Whether it’s a sandwich, a burrito, or groceries, the Uber Eats team builds technology to connect people with what they want, when and where they want it. Our Strategy & Ops team empowers our regional and local teams through insights, analysis, and thought leadership.About the RoleWe are looking for an individual who has strong operational, processes implementation and analytical skills. The Strategy & Operations Coordinator will work to boost courier, eater, and restaurant experience, and drive growth and profitability via creative solutions. This is a key position that can make a big impact on our business and change the way people deliver anything in LATAM. We are currently operating in over 30 cities, and we have a lot of exciting projects going on!What You'll DoProblem Solving - Scope sophisticated problems and derive integral solutions based on robust analysisDevelop & Optimize Processes - Take big picture ideas and break them into impactful stepsStrong Executional and Implementation skills - Make projects and plans a realityCollaboration -Build and develop positive relationships with cross-functional teams, i.e. work closely with Central Operations and Territory Teams to improve our metrics and overcome challengesGet Ahead - You lead your projects completely and are a constant advocate for crafting business value and have a positive approach and ability to operate in a very fast paced environment Basic Qualifications A minimum of 2 years of experience in consulting, investment banking, strategy, business development, analytics, any operations-intense fast-paced environment, or a variety of other specialty roles, but we will consider candidates with less experience if they meet our other requirementsEnglish and Spanish proficiencyExperience with a consistent record of solving analytical problemsEasily adapt to a constantly-changing work environmentData-driven decision mentality through strong analytical thinkingStrong implementation skills and process design orientationCreative solutions attitude with an affinity to constantly A/B test ideas Preferred QualificationsSQL, Python or R. Willing to learn SQL if it is not a skill they own yet
